name: LoanShark (4 day GameJam, Feb 2020)
description:
LoanShark is a game in Unreal Engine 4 that I worked on with 3 other people in a team (Which we called BATH, following our initials), where the player is taking and selling items from a house while the homeowner chases the player, making you drop the item you are holding if caught.

You have to try and sell as much as possible within the time limit. This increases every time you make a sale. Each item has a different value so don't waste your time on cheap, easy to grab items.

Team Roles:
Brandon (Myself) - Team Manager & Gameplay Programmer
Andrew - AI Programmer
Taylor - Asset Modeller
Hayden - Asset Modeller

All members worked on concept and sharing of ideas.

This was a college project in February of 2020, only worked on for a few hours each day for 4 days during the college schedule.
